open tray means firmware needs updating to LT+
black screen then dirty disc means failed ap25 challenge/response, logged for a ban,check with xval (LT+ protects from this just turn console off/on within 3 mins when at black screen to bypass dirty disc screen and consoole logging ap25 fail).
they can release ap25 in a title update like they did with mw2,halo reach ect but again if you got LT+ your protected.thanks c4eva (make a donation if you appreciate his work).
